name: Rebol-linux-packages
body:
Rebol-linux-packages
====================

All files and script nedded to create linux installation packages for Rebol

You can download packages from:
http://www.maxvessi.net/rebsite/Linux/index.php
https://github.com/angerangel/Rebol-linux-packages


To update the packages, update the rebol interpeter in the folders:
rebol/usr/bin/
rebol_AMD64/usr/bin/

then launch packcreator.sh script.

If you need to contact me: maxint@tiscali.it
tagline: All files and script nedded to create linux installation packages for Rebol
